Patient 7: A 16-year-old male with a history of ADHD and mild asthma. He is currently taking methylphenidate for ADHD and uses an albuterol inhaler as needed for asthma symptoms. His family history is significant for type 1 diabetes in his father. There are no known drug allergies. His medical records indicate a previous trial of atomoxetine, which was discontinued due to side effects.
